item.title: Forgive Me Father 2 for PS5, Xbox Series launches September 23
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Switch version to follow at a later date.

Fulqrum Publishing and developer Byte Barrel will release first-person shooter sequel Forgive Me Father 2 for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on September 23, the companies announced. The Switch version will follow at a later date.

Forgive Me Father 2 first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG on October 19, 2023, followed by a full release on October 24, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Fulqrum Publishing:

About

Embark on a path to salvation as you continue the story of the Priest character from the first installment. How long can you balance on the edge of sanity? Will your sins be forgiven, or your soul consumed by madness?

Key Features

  • Distinctive Dark Comic-Like Visuals – Dark hand-drawn graphic design where every frame looks like a page from a comic book is one of the pillars of Forgive Me Father, and the sequel brings a fresh perspective to its unique style with improved sprites, models and atmospheric lighting effects. Prepare to feast your eyes on juicy blood effects and animated gibs flying everywhere!
  • Dive Into the Madness – Defeat Lovecraftian nightmares with a wide range of weapons. Fight hosts of diverse, formidable enemies and beware: each and every one of them evolves into different, ever more evil and twisted forms of themselves – this journey does not get any easier!
  • Gear Up and Fight – Define your own playstyle and assemble the deadliest arsenal with plenty of weapons to choose from, each with even more powerful variations designed to cause absolute mayhem and bring utter destruction upon your foes. Take your pick from devastating shotguns, lethally accurate rifles, explosive launchers, and unleash their full potential.
  • Gain Mad Skills – Overwhelming madness is your best friend and worst enemy at the same time. Let it flow through you, unleash absolute mayhem on your foes and gain extraordinary powers as a reward. Embrace the insanity, use it to fuel your bizarre new abilities, and teach the horrors assaulting your senses to fear YOU!
  • Otherworldly Soundtrack – Experience the surprisingly fitting combination of strong electric guitar riffs and energetic drums underscoring the dark Lovecraftian atmosphere. Slay hordes of deranged cultists and confront unimaginable ancient evil while listening to the original soundtrack that will make you headbang for hours on end.

item.title: Sports action game SPARK! PHOTON BLAST announced for PS5, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Playable at Tokyo Game Show 2025.

Japanese developer DESIGN ACT has announced sports action game SPARK! PHOTON BLAST for PlayStation 5 and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026. It will also be playable at the Indie Game Corner at Tokyo Game Show 2025, which will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

About

The virtual emotion shoot system “SPARK!,” developed to transform and convey unexpressed feelings into actions. People access a virtual reality space and spend their days clashing with a variety of feelings. You can take on various characters and convey your precious feelings by shooting a “photon sphere” at the heart of the person you want to convey them to!

Story

A.D. XXXX, the world collapsed. A virus spread, people’s contact was severed, and the world became one where unexpressed feelings were locked away. However, a revolutionary technology to save the world is born…

How to Play

It’s a game created in a virtual reality space, surrounded by walls on all four sides. Players shoot spheres at each other, aiming to get their sphere into the opponent’s goal, which requires quick reflexes and strategy.

  • Customize your character and sparkling effects.
  • Clear multiple storylines.
  • Unlock avatar items by clearing stories.

Emo Shoot System

The greatest feature that makes “SPARK!” exciting is the “Emo Shoot System.” When you shoot a sphere into your opponent’s court, and they don’t touch it, the sphere reflects off the wall and comes back. Each time you chase and hit the returning sphere, it powers up. If you hit it three consecutive times, the sphere enters “SPARK!!” mode, and you can “break” the opponent player to aim for the now-empty goal!

item.title: UNYIELDER launches September 29
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Roguelite first-person shooter action game dated.

Roguelite first-person shooter action game UNYIELDER will launch for PC via Steam on September 29, publisher Shueisha Games and developer TrueWorld Studios announced. It will support English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, German, and Spanish language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

UNYIELDER is an intense single-player boss-rush movement first-person shooter with an absurd and exploitable rogue-looter. Assemble your arsenal of destruction, smash your way through Antarctica, and face your own final boss.

UNYIELDER unites looter-shooters, movement first-person shooters, and character action games in an infinitely expandable roguelite to create spectacular, absurd and chaotic boss battles.

Boss Rush / Rogue-Looter / Movement First-Person Shooter

  • Break the Game – Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (And have fun!)
  • Embody Tenacity – The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (But so do you!)
  • Domination – Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (Or just pick the weird stuff, who’s going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss – With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss to unlock special weapons, perks and characters.

Erebus, the Capital City of Antarctica, 1972

A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, Erebus finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA,” a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made “Heaven.”

Key Features

  • Carve Your Path – Journey through the war-torn lands of Erebus, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power. The Fool awaits.
  • A Walking Cataclysm of Your Own Design – Wield Rupture, Rhapsody, and Reverie, volatile sources of ineffable power. Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.
  • Build Your Final Boss – Scavenge the limbs of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight. Discover hidden Patterns to pave for new, Endgame Character classes, Weapons, Perks and other Secrets.
  • Original Soundtrack – Featuring an original soundtrack composed and produced by Karu.
